name: Stop & Frisk
tagline: Mapping NYC Stop and Frisk data
body:
NYC Stop and Frisk
===================

Stops and arrests:
![arrestmap](https://raw.github.com/maxliving/stopnfrisk/master/output/arrests.png)
Green = arrests, Red = stops that did not result in arrests.

Stops by race:
![racemap](https://raw.github.com/maxliving/stopnfrisk/master/output/stops_byrace.png)

Stops choropleth:
![chorostops](https://raw.github.com/maxliving/stopnfrisk/master/output/choropleth_stops.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
